title: My Girlfriend Cheated on Me With a Senior, so I’m Cheating on Her With His Girlfriend (WN) - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manga   Average-looking Protagonist   Award-winning Work   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Blind Dates   College/University   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Revenge   Secret Crush   Slow Romance   Wealthy Characters
author: Shinden Mihiro   震電みひろ
description: Yuu Isshiki, a first year university student, learns that his girlfriend Karen is having an affair with his senior, Kamokura. He was so shocked and devastated that he asks Kamokura’s girlfriend and the most beautiful girl on the campus, Touko: “Please have an affair with me!” A thrilling romantic comedy that begins with an accomplice relationship!>
